title: Database migrations
description:
Most of the application we are working on are built around the data. Since the information is the core value of the application we store it in the persistent and reliable storage - database. Applications evolve in time so does the way we store the data. In this post, I’m going to present my experiences and thoughts on evolving database schema.

Read more

title: Does batch size matter?
description: This post is aimed at readers who are already familiar with stochastic gradient descent (SGD) and terms like “batch size”. For an introduction to these ideas, I recommend Goodfellow et al.’s Deep Learning, in particular the introduction and, for more about SGD, Chapter 8. The relevance of SGD is that it has made it feasible to work with much more complex models than was formerly possible.
